.table node
.table base_edge
node{id: "A", label: "A"}.
node{id: "B", label: "B"}.
node{id: "C", label: "C"}.
node{id: "D", label: "D"}.
base_edge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
base_edge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
base_edge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
----
text/plain

trans_edge{from: X, to: Z} :-
  base_edge{from: X, to: Z} |
  base_edge{from: X, to: Y} & trans_edge{from: Y, to: Z}.
----
text/plain
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {X: "A", Z: "B"}.
trans_edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {X: "B", Z: "C"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "C"}.
trans_edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {X: "C", Z: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {X: "B", Y: "C", Z: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "C"}.
trans_edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {X: "B", Y: "C", Z: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "D"}.

edge{to: T, from: F, label: ""} :-
  trans_edge{to: T, from: F}.
----
text/plain
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "C"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "C"}; {F: "A", T: "C"}.
edge{from: "B", label: "", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "C"}; {F: "A", T: "C"}.
trans_edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {X: "B", Y: "C", Z: "D"}.
edge{from: "B", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "B", T: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "C", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "B", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "B", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "C"}; {F: "A", T: "C"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {X: "A", Y: "B", Z: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "B", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "B", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", label: "", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.

.graphviz
----
text/plain

    | ^
